Work:
DV-3085 - Investigate the issue that PDF signer got extremely slow. 
Compared the memory usage between the old version and the new version of SecureBlackBox by using Jetbrains dotMemory Unit, found out that the new verion's memory usage increased from 1.710515MB to 7.458328MB for a 6KB PDF file, that's a 436% increase. 
For a relatively big 27.627MB PDF, the memory usage increased from 1.871752MB to 7.628747MB, a 407.6% increase
DV-2366 - Verify that the issue is fixed in the latest version of backend and closed the issue
